title.rendered: Day 2 – Marqueza Swimwear. Miami Swim Week

content.rendered:
Miami Swim Week Powered by Art Hearts Fashion Day 2. 

24Fashion TV Exclusive: 

Marqueza Swimwear


Marqueza Swimwear showcased a collection in tones of blue, inspired by denim, for both men and women. The mood of the evening was definitely blue but only literally. The patterns and styles brought out by Marqueza Swimwear were retro yet with a modern update that would not look out of place in 2021 or 2001. This is something we can call 'timeless' - a way of designing beautiful things that do not go out of style but persevere and continue to look cool and modern for many years.

Marqueza Swimwear is Bibyana Marquez latest project - her own swimsuit line. Marqueza Swimwear features Bibyanas exclusive designs manufactured with environmentally-friendly and eco-friendly resources. Swimsuits are designed for all shapes and sizes, with styles to help everyone feel comfortable and confident while enjoying a great time with friends and family. Marqueza Swimwears first collection, launching Summer 2021, was inspired by denim. Denim is a staple in everyone's closet and Bibyanas favorite fabric. Bibyana merges the versatility of denim with styles that everyone can wear. Designer: Bibyana Marquez

Model Porsha A Martin walks for Marqueza Swimwear
